application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 8 (Fire Safety Strategy) of planning permission 22/00362/HOU (Erection of single-storey side and rear extension. Addition of first floor into existing bungalow)
decision_conditions: A brief Fire Strategy has been submitted but this does not include a Statement of Competence. The strategy does not include all of the relevant details to satisfy policy D12 of the London Plan (2021) and only includes generic basic information with no detail or plans, specific to the site/development. It therefore does not demonstrate that the development would be safe for its lifetime and, as such, this condition cannot be discharged.
